·霓虹灯 ·霓虹灯

霓虹灯 霓虹灯
Who knows how long' how long' how long
谁又知道
She ·can go before she burns away
她在光芒燃烧殆尽后就要离开
She comes and she goes
她·来来去·去
Like no one can
没有人·可以像她一样
Sh·e comes and she goes
她来来去去
She·'s slippi·ng throu·gh my h·ands
她悄·悄从·我手中·溜走
She's· always b·uzzing just l·ike
